Hi,

I'm playing with the charting tools - and frankly they're great! However, I'm kind of unsure how to go about doing the following:

I want to display several series one the same chart -> this is OK.

I want the legend to display a checkbox next to each legend item -> this is OK, bit messy though.

When the user clicks on the checkbox, the series should disappear (unchecked) or re-appear -> this is OK

When a series disappears, it would be good to get the axis to update with their new relative min / max values for the current visible series data.

 

Is this possible? Could anyone suggest something, or perhaps i'm going about this completely wrong - any better ideas?

 

Thanks,

 

Pete.
